1.text: Fill a dish with clean water.

2.text: Remove any food scraps with water.

3.text: Place the sponge on a paper towel.

4.text: Squeeze some lemon juice into a bowl.
4.vid: /d/db/Clean a Sponge in the Microwave Step 4.360p.mp4

5.vid: /f/f4/Clean a Sponge in the Microwave Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Soak the sponge in the lemon-water.

7.text: Place the sponge in the microwave.
7.vid: /8/80/Clean a Sponge in the Microwave Step 7.360p.mp4

8.vid: /7/7e/Clean a Sponge in the Microwave Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Let the sponge cool before using.
9.vid: /6/6b/Clean a Sponge in the Microwave Step 9.360p.mp4
